This is extremely serious and we need to contact your company to explain. We can be reached at b940-395-9839 USA We are manufacturers of head studs and fighting a man who filed and succeeded at the USA patent office. We are having it canceled, and we are using your studs as the reason its false. No head stud can be patented as we know, but this happened and it is your dual diameter stud that he has patented as his invention, so do not hesitate if you see this to contact us. Thank you
